allowAnyUserToBeCoHost.description: Whether or not to allow any attendee with a host account on the target site to become a co-host when joining the meeting
allowAnyUserToBeCoHost.title: Allow Any User To Be Co-Host
allowAnyUserToBeCoHost.displayName: Allow Any User To Be Co-Host

excludePassword.description: Whether or not to exclude password from the meeting email invitation
excludePassword.title: Exclude Password

allowAuthenticatedDevices.description: Whether or not to allow authenticated video devices in the meeting's organization to start or join the meeting without a prompt
allowAuthenticatedDevices.title: Allow Authenticated Devices

siteUrl.description: URL of the Webex site which the meeting is created on. If not specified, the meeting is created on user's preferred site. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
siteUrl.title: Site URL

end.description: Date and time for the end of the meeting. Acceptable format.
end.title: End

enabledJoinBeforeHost.description: Whether or not to allow any attendee to join the meeting before the host joins the meeting
enabledJoinBeforeHost.title: Enabled Join Before Host

password.description: Meeting password. Must conform to the site's password complexity settings. If not specified, a random password conforming to the site's password rules will be generated automatically
password.title: Password

allowFirstUserToBeCoHost.description: Whether or not to allow the first attendee of the meeting with a host account on the target site to become a co-host
allowFirstUserToBeCoHost.title: Allow First User To Be Co-Host
allowFirstUserToBeCoHost.displayName: Allow First User To Be Co-Host

sendEmail.description: Whether or not to send emails to host and invitees. It is an optional field and default value is true.
sendEmail.title: Send Email

start.description: Date and time for the start of the meeting. Acceptable format.
start.title: Start

hostEmail.description: Email address for the meeting host. This attribute should only be set if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.
hostEmail.title: Host Email

coHost.description: Whether or not invitee is allowed to be a co-host for the meeting
coHost.title: Co-Host

enableConnectAudioBeforeHost.description: Whether or not to allow any attendee to connect audio in the meeting before the host joins the meeting
enableConnectAudioBeforeHost.title: Enable Connect Audio Before Host

publicMeeting.description: Whether or not to allow the meeting to be listed on the public calendar
publicMeeting.title: Public Meeting

enabledAutoRecordMeeting.description: Whether or not meeting is recorded automatically
enabledAutoRecordMeeting.title: Enabled Auto Record Meeting

recurrence.description: Meeting series recurrence rule (conforming with RFC 2445), applying only to meeting series
recurrence.title: Recurrence

reminderTime.description: The number of minutes before the meeting begins, for sending an email reminder to the host
reminderTime.title: Reminder Time

agenda.description: The meeting's agenda. Cannot be longer that 1300 characters.
agenda.title: Agenda

joinBeforeHostMinutes.description: The number of minutes an attendee can join the meeting before the meeting start time and the host joins
joinBeforeHostMinutes.title: Join Before Host Minutes

anyOf.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
anyOf.title: Room Name or ID

anyOf.description: List messages in a room, by ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
anyOf.title: Room Name or ID

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

end.description: Date and time for the end of the meeting. Acceptable format.
end.title: End

start.description: Date and time for the start of the meeting. Acceptable format.
start.title: Start

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit

anyOf.title: Limit

sendEmail.title: Send Email

hostEmail.description: Email address for the meeting host. This parameter is only used if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.
hostEmail.title: Host Email

sendEmail.description: Whether or not to send emails to host and invitees. It is an optional field and default value is true.
sendEmail.title: Send Email

password.description: Meeting password. It's required when the meeting is protected by a password and the current user is not privileged to view it if they are not a host, co-host or invitee of the meeting.
password.title: Password

hostEmail.description: Email address for the meeting host. This parameter is only used if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.
hostEmail.title: Host Email

to.description: End date and time (inclusive) for the meeting. Acceptable format.
to.title: To

hostEmail.description: Email address for the meeting host
hostEmail.title: Host Email

meetingNumber.description: Meeting number for the meeting objects being requested
meetingNumber.title: Meeting Number

current.description: Whether to return just the current meeting or all meetings
current.title: Limit to Current Meetings

participantEmail.description: Email of a person that must be a meeting participant
participantEmail.title: Participant Email

siteUrl.description: URL of the Webex site which the API lists meetings from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
siteUrl.title: Site URL

integrationTag.description: External tag created by another application, e.g. Zendesk ticket ID or Jira ID
integrationTag.title: Integration Tag

from.description: Start date and time (inclusive) for the meeting. Acceptable format.
from.title: From

webLink.description: URL encoded link to information page for the meeting objects being requested
webLink.title: Weblink

state.description: Meeting state for the meeting objects being requested
state.title: State

mentionedPeople.description: List only messages with certain person mentioned. Enter their ID. You can use 'me' as a shorthand for yourself
mentionedPeople.title: Mentioned Person

parentId.description: List messages with a parent, by ID
parentId.title: Parent Message ID

before.description: List messages sent before a date and time
before.title: Before

beforeMessage.description: List messages sent before a message, by ID
beforeMessage.title: Before Message

anyOf.description: ID of the message to delete
anyOf.title: Message ID

anyOf.description: ID of the message to retrieve
anyOf.title: Message ID

anyOf.description: ID of the message to update
anyOf.title: Message ID

allowAuthenticatedDevices.title: Allow Authenticated Devices

siteUrl.description: URL of the Webex site which the meeting is created on. If not specified, the meeting is created on user's preferred site. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

autoAcceptRequest.description: Whether or not meeting registration request is accepted automatically
autoAcceptRequest.title: Auto Accept Request

enabledJoinBeforeHost.title: Enabled Join Before Host

allowFirstUserToBeCoHost.title: Allow First User To Be Co-Host

hostEmail.title: Host Email

coHost.description: Whether or not invitee is allowed to be a co-host for the meeting
coHost.title: Co-Host

integrationTags.description: External keys created by an integration application in its own domain. They could be Zendesk ticket IDs, Jira IDs, Salesforce Opportunity IDs, etc.
integrationTags.title: Integration Tags

enableConnectAudioBeforeHost.description: Whether or not to allow any attendee to connect audio in the meeting before the host joins the meeting
enableConnectAudioBeforeHost.title: Enable Connect Audio Before Host

publicMeeting.title: Public Meeting

enabledAutoRecordMeeting.description: Whether or not meeting is recorded automatically
enabledAutoRecordMeeting.title: Enabled Auto Record Meeting

recurrence.description: Rule for how the meeting should recur. Acceptable format.

reminderTime.title: Reminder Time

agenda.description: Meeting agenda. The agenda can be a maximum of 1300 characters long.
agenda.title: Agenda

joinBeforeHostMinutes.description: The number of minutes an attendee can join the meeting before the meeting start time and the host joins
joinBeforeHostMinutes.title: Join Before Host Minutes

binaryPropertyName.description: The field in the node input containing the binary file data
binaryPropertyName.title: Input Field With File

url.description: The public URL of the file
url.title: URL

markdown.description: The message in markdown format. When used the text parameter is used to provide alternate text for UI clients that do not support rich text.
markdown.title: Markdown

spacing.description: Controls the amount of spacing between this element and the preceding element
spacing.title: Spacing

isVisible.description: Whether this item will be removed from the visual trees
isVisible.title: Is Visible

fontType.description: Type of font to use for rendering
fontType.title: Font Type

text.description: Text to display. A subset of markdown is supported (https://aka.ms/ACTextFeatures).
text.title: Text

isMultiline.description: Whether to allow multiple lines of input
isMultiline.title: Is Multiline

value.description: The initial value for this field
value.title: Value

maxLines.description: Specifies the maximum number of lines to display
maxLines.title: Max Lines

isSubtle.description: Whether to display text slightly toned down to appear less prominent
isSubtle.title: Is Subtle

maxLength.description: Hint of maximum length characters to collect (may be ignored by some clients)
maxLength.title: Max Length

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Displayed when no text has been input.
placeholder.title: Placeholder

anyOf.description: A unique identifier associated with the item
anyOf.title: ID

anyOf.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.
anyOf.title: ID

height.description: Specifies the height of the element
height.title: Height

regex.description: Regular expression indicating the required format of this text input
regex.title: Regex

separator.description: Whether to draw a separating line at the top of the element
separator.title: Separator

weight.description: Controls the weight of TextBlock elements
weight.title: Weight

wrap.description: Whether to allow text to wrap. Otherwise, text is clipped.
wrap.title: Wrap

style.description: Controls the style of an Action, which influences how the action is displayed, spoken, etc
style.title: Style

data.description: Any extra data to pass along. These are essentially ‘hidden’ properties.
data.title: Data

title.description: Label for button or link that represents this action
title.title: Title

iconUrl.description: Optional icon to be shown on the action in conjunction with the title. Supports data URI in version 1.2+.
iconUrl.title: Icon URL

verb.description: The card author-defined verb associated with this action
verb.title: Verb

markdownText.description: The message, in Markdown format. The maximum message length is 7439 bytes.
markdownText.title: Markdown

title.description: Meeting title. The title can be a maximum of 128 characters long.
title.title: Title
